üß≠ Pathfinder Simulation

An Evolutionary Programming Approach to Multi-Objective Pathfinding

üß≠ Pathfinder Simulation Project

An advanced evolutionary programming solution to the multi-objective pathfinding problem. This simulation employs discrete stochastic event modeling to evolve intelligent populations navigating through complex grid environments.

üì¶ Packages

Package Description
üíº io Input parsing and formatted output generation modules
üèóÔ∏è model Core domain entities: Grid, Individual, Path, Point, Population
‚ö° simulation Event-driven simulation engine with PEC and event management
üîß util Utility classes for comfort calculation and stochastic generation
üé® visualization ASCII grid visualization with pathfinding result display

üéØ Project Objectives

  • üé™ Develop optimal pathfinding algorithms between specified grid coordinates
  • üöß Handle dynamic obstacle placement and variable edge traversal costs
  • üß¨ Implement evolutionary programming with comfort-based fitness evaluation
  • ‚è±Ô∏è Utilize discrete event simulation architecture with Pending Event Container (PEC)

üß¨ Evolutionary Algorithm Implementation

The simulation employs three fundamental evolutionary mechanisms:

üíÄ

Mortality Events

Stochastic death events following exponential distribution based on individual comfort levels

üë∂

Reproduction Events

Offspring generation with inherited path prefixes determined by parental fitness

üö∂

Movement Events

Adaptive exploration of adjacent grid positions with cycle elimination

üìä Fitness Evaluation Function

Individual fitness is quantified through a comprehensive comfort function incorporating:

üí∞ Path cost efficiency relative to traversal length
üìè Euclidean distance optimization to target destination
‚öôÔ∏è Configurable sensitivity parameters for algorithmic fine-tuning

üöÄ Application Usage

üé≤ Random Parameter Generation

java -jar project.jar -r n m xi yi xf yf nscz nobs œÑ ŒΩ ŒΩmax k Œº Œ¥ œÅ

üìÅ File-based Configuration

java -jar project.jar -f <inputfile>

üé® Enhanced Visualization

java -jar project.jar -f <inputfile> --visualize

‚≠ê Key Technical Features

üé≤

Stochastic Simulation

Discrete event modeling with exponential distributions

üß†

Evolutionary Fitness

Comfort-based optimization algorithms

üå°Ô∏è

Population Control

Epidemic mechanisms for dynamic regulation

üéØ

Multi-Objective

Balancing cost and distance metrics

üìä

Real-time Monitoring

Population state tracking and reporting

üé®
